color_output

The Unit Test Framework is able to produce color output on systems which support it. To enable this behavior, set this option to yes. By default the framework does not produce color output.

Acceptable values

Boolean with default value no.

Command line syntax
  • --color_output[=<boolean value>]
  • -x [<boolean value>]
Environment variable 
BOOST_TEST_COLOR_OUTPUT
